ch0110_00_kasumi/0101_0701_01_10:
Hi, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
You look like you’re having a good day.
ch0110_00_kasumi/0101_0701_02_10: Wanna head to the beach with me for a bit?
ch0110_00_kasumi/7101_0701_01_10:
I’m glad I brought my swimsuit from the Cerulean
Gym with me to Pasio!
ch0110_00_kasumi/7101_0701_02_10:
When it comes to getting in the water, there’s
just something about this suit that feels right,
you know?
ch0110_00_kasumi/7101_0701_03_10:
Do you have any clothes that you always go
back to? Dressing up is nice and all, but comfort
is important, too!
ch0110_00_kasumi/7105_0701_01_10:
Hmm... Training at the beach would be way more
fun with you around, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0110_00_kasumi/7105_0701_02_10:
We could run through the sand together and have
fun in the water with our Pokémon!
ch0110_00_kasumi/7105_0701_03_10:
Oh, and it’s no big deal if you don’t know how
to swim. I can coach you through it, no problem!
ch0110_00_kasumi/1701_0702_01_10:
I found it on the beach and thought maybe you
could use it!
ch0110_00_kasumi/2501_0701_01_10:
The other day, I tried challenging a Squirtle to a
swimming race at the beach! I ended up losing
pretty badly, though.
ch0110_00_kasumi/2501_0701_02_10:
Is it weird to challenge a Pokémon to a race?
I didn’t think it was all that crazy.
ch0110_00_kasumi/2501_0701_03_10:
I can face anything, no matter how hard it is.
You’re the one who taught me that!
ch0110_00_kasumi/2501_0702_01_10:
You challenge your opponents without any
hesitation, no matter who they are...
ch0110_00_kasumi/2501_0702_02_10: AND you can beat them! That’s so awesome!
ch0110_00_kasumi/3001_0701_01_10:
A quick swim right after you wake up
is a perfect, refreshing start to the day!
ch0110_00_kasumi/3003_0701_01_10:
Snack time’s over! Time to get out there
and use up all this energy! Wanna battle?
ch0110_00_kasumi/3005_0701_01_10:
Man, I don’t feel sleepy at all yet!
Maybe it’s because I took a nap while
surfing with my Pokémon earlier...
